attributes.action: Public vote of 'no confidence' in Premier David Cameron
attributes.background: Prime Minister David Cameron has continually lied to his peole over immigration and the public should have the right to vote 'No Confidence' against him

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
